import React, { useState } from 'react' import {AiOutlineEye,AiOutlineEyeInvisible} from "react-icons" const SignUpForm = () => { const [showPassword,setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ firstname:"",lastname:"",email:"",password:"",confirmPassword:"" }) function changeHandler(event){ setFormData((prevData) =>({ ...prevData, [event.target.name]:event.target.value })) } return (
) } export default SignUpForm
